jú
mandarin orange (Citrus reticulata); tangerine
мандариновый апельсин (Citrus reticulata); мандарин
rtega_mnemonic:
橘橘RSmandarin orange, Chinese orange, tangerine
  • tree 木 with brightly coloured 矞 fruit
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 矞 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
柑橘 [ gān jú ]: citrus
橘红 [ jú hóng ]: orange (color); orange peel (used in TCM)
金橘 [ jīn jú ]: kumquat; also written 金桔
越橘 [ yuè jú ]: cowberry; blue berry
橘子 [ jú zi ]: tangerine; Classifiers: 个
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 矞 [ yù ] to bore with an awl; bright, charming
heisig_chinese_memo: The tangerine is a type of tree which sometimes yields poor quality fruit. In such times, instead of simply standing up and inviting customers to make a deal, a salesman must force the sale of tangerines by brandishing a halberd and forcing the customer to make a deal by purchasing your substandard fruit.
Ru_AutoNotes:
Татибана - дикий цитрус, растущий в Японии. Несъедобен.

Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 口 (рот), 木 (дерево), 矛 (копьё)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the bright (冏) halberd (矛) in the tree (木) is a mandarin orange
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The tangerine is a type of tree which sometimes yields poor quality fruit. In such times, instead of simply standing up and inviting customers to make a deal, a salesman must force the sale of tangerines by brandishing a halberd and forcing the customer to make a deal by purchasing your substandard fruit.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " to "矞", it means an evergreen tree fruit tree, the fruit is orange, oblate, the skin is red and yellow, the flesh is juicy, and the taste is different. Peel, core and leaves can be used as medicine. "Shu Wen": "Fruit, from the south of the Yangtze River. From the wood, the sound." "Shu‧ Yugong": "Jue Bao orange pomelo tin tribute." Kong Chuan: "Little is orange, big is pomelo." Kong Yingdashu: "The two fruits of citrus and pomelo are different from each other. Compared with the actual ones, the pomelo is bigger and smaller.

" Tangerine " also means one of the names of Yueyang. "Erya·Shitian": "Yueyang: The moon is called the end in the first, and the orange in the second."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and "矞", it means a kind of evergreen tree fruit tree, the fruit is orange.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「矞」聲，表示一種常綠喬木果木，果實為橘子，扁圓形，果皮紅黃色，果肉多汁，味酸甜不一。果皮、果核及樹葉都可入藥。《說文》：「果，出江南。从木，矞聲。」《書‧禹貢》：「厥包橘柚錫貢。」孔傳：「小曰橘，大曰柚。」孔穎達疏：「橘柚二果，其種本別，以實相比，則柚大橘小。」

　　「橘」也表示月陽名之一。《爾雅‧釋天》：「月陽：月在甲曰畢，在乙曰橘。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「矞」聲，表示一種常綠喬木果木，果實為橘子。

從「 木 」，「 矞 」聲，表示一種常綠喬木果木，果實為橘子，扁圓形，果皮紅黃色，果肉多汁，味酸甜不一。果皮、果核及樹葉都可入藥。《說文》：「果，出江南。从木，矞聲。」《書‧禹貢》：「厥包橘柚錫貢。」孔傳：「小曰橘，大曰柚。」孔穎達疏：「橘柚二果，其種本別，以實相比，則柚大橘小。」 「 橘 」也表示月陽名之一。《爾雅‧釋天》：「月陽：月在甲曰畢，在乙曰橘。」
From the sound of " wood" to " 矞", it means an evergreen tree fruit tree, the fruit is orange, oblate, the skin is red and yellow, the flesh is juicy, and the taste is different. Peel, core and leaves can be used as medicine. "Shu Wen": "Fruit, from the south of the Yangtze River. From the wood, the sound." "Shu‧ Yugong": "Jue Bao orange pomelo tin tribute." Kong Chuan: "Little is orange, big is pomelo." Kong Yingdashu: "The two fruits of citrus and pomelo are different from each other. Compared with the actual ones, the pomelo is bigger and smaller. " Tangerine" also means one of the names of Yueyang. "Erya·Shitian": "Yueyang: The moon is called the end in the first, and the orange in the second."

橘字的基本解释

橘
jú
常绿乔木，果实称“橘子”，多汁，味酸甜可食。种子、树叶、果皮均可入药：橘红。橘络。橘黄色。橘化为枳（喻人必然受环境的影响而发生变化）。

橘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jú］
［《廣韻》居聿切，入術，見。］
亦作“桔2”。
(1)果木名。果实为橘子。常绿乔木，树枝细，通常有刺，叶子长卵圆形，果实扁圆形，果皮红黄色，果肉多汁，味酸甜不一。果皮、果核及树叶都可入药。
(2)月阳名之一。

橘字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橘； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页553第27
【唐韻】居聿切【集韻】【韻會】訣律切【正韻】厥筆切，?鈞入聲。【說文】果出江南，樹碧而冬生。【書·禹貢】揚州厥包橘柚錫貢。【註】小曰橘，大曰柚。【爾雅翼】江南爲橘，江北爲枳。【史記·貨殖傳】蜀漢江陵千樹橘，其人與千戸侯等。【襄陽記】謂之木奴。李衡于龍陽洲種橘千株，敕兒曰：吾有木奴千頭，不責汝衣食。【宋·韓彥直·橘譜】橘品十有四種。　又【爾雅·釋天】月在甲曰畢，在乙曰橘，謂之月陽。

橘字的源字形

橘字的起名意思

常绿灌木或小乔木。夏季开白花。果实叫"橘子"。

Tangerine
Basic explanation of words
Tangerine
jú
Evergreen tree, the fruit is called "orange", juicy, sweet and sour and edible. Seeds, leaves and peels can be used as medicine: orange red. Tangerine network. Orange. Tangerine turns into trifoliate (Yu people will inevitably change under the influence of the environment).
Tangerine
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jú］
["Guang Yun" Ju Yu cut, enter the surgery, see. ]
Also known as "Orange 2".
(1) The name of the fruit tree. The fruit is orange. Evergreen trees, thin branches, usually with thorns, long ovoid leaves, oblate fruits, red-yellow skin, juicy flesh, and sweet and sour taste. Peel, core and leaves can all be used as medicine.
(2) One of the names of Yueyang.
Tangerine
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　 Orange; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 553 27
[Tang Yun] Ju Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Jue Luqie [Zheng Yun] Juebi cut,? Jun enters the sound. [Said the text] The fruit is out of the south of the Yangtze River, and the trees are green and born in winter. 【Book·Yugong】Yangzhou Juebao orange pomelo Xi Gong. [Note] Little is orange, and big is pomelo. [Erya Wing] The south of the Yangtze River is orange, and the north of the Yangtze River is orange. [Historical Records · Commodity Transmission] Shuhan Jiangling Thousand Tree Tangerine, its people and Qianhuhou etc. 【Xiangyang Ji】The wooden slave. Li Heng planted thousands of oranges in Longyangzhou, and the edict said: I have a thousand heads of wooden slaves, and I will not blame you for food and clothing. 【Song·Han Yanzhi·Orange Spectrum】There are ten kinds of orange products.　[Erya·Shitian] The moon is called the end in Jia, and it is called orange in the second, which is called Moon Yang.
Tangerine
Source glyph
Tangerine
Name meaning
Evergreen shrubs or small trees. White flowers bloom in summer. The fruit is called "orange".
橘
形声字。木表意,篆书形体像树木,表示橘是果木;商(ya)表声,需有尖锐、截穿义,表示橘树多尖刺。本义是橘树。
①橘树,常绿乔木,果实扁圆形,红色或橙黃色,味甜酸可
以吃。果皮可入药。2橘树的果实。

мандарин
Пиктофонетические символы.
Знак дерева означает, что шрифт печати подобен дереву, что означает, что апельсин - это фруктовое дерево; знак шан (я) должен иметь острое и проницательное значение, что означает, что у апельсинового дерева много шипов.
Первоначальное значение - апельсиновое дерево.
① Апельсины, вечнозеленые деревья, сплюснутые плоды, красные или оранжево-желтые, кисло-сладкие вкусы можно есть.
Пилинг можно использовать как лекарство.
2 Плод апельсинового дерева.
~ Ping ~ Orange ~ Red ~ Yellow ~ Luo ~ Peel ~ Juice ~ Chau
~ Цзычуань ~ Фу ~ Апельсин ~ Золото ~ Мед ~ Юэ ~
